name: Outline
description: Open source wiki and knowledge base for growing teams

SECRET_KEY.description: A 32-character secret key, generate with openssl rand -hex 32

UTILS_SECRET.description: A 32-character secret key, generate with openssl rand -hex 32

URL.description: https://{your app name}.herokuapp.com, or the domain you are binding to

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: See https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/OAuth2 to create a new Google OAuth client. You must configure at least one of Slack or Google to control login.

AZURE_CLIENT_ID.description: To configure Microsoft/Azure auth, you'll need to create an OAuth Client. See the guide for details on setting up your Azure App: https://wiki.generaloutline.com/share/dfa77e56-d4d2-4b51-8ff8-84ea6608faa4

OIDC_CLIENT_ID.description: To configure generic OIDC auth, you'll need some kind of identity provider. See documentation for whichever IdP you use to acquire the following info; Redirect URI is https://<URL>/auth/oidc.callback

OIDC_DISABLE_REDIRECT.description: Prevent the app from automatically redirecting to the OIDC login page

OIDC_USERNAME_CLAIM.description: Specify which claims to derive user information from. Supports any valid JSON path with the JWT payload

SLACK_CLIENT_ID.description: See https://api.slack.com/apps to create a new Slack app. You must configure at least one of Slack or Google to control login.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Needed to save file uploads. Optional for development / testing

AWS_S3_UPLOAD_BUCKET_URL.description: Live web link to your bucket. For CNAMEs, https://yourbucket.example.com

AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE.description: Use path-style URL's for connecting to S3 instead of subdomain. This is useful for S3-compatible storage.

AWS_REGION.description: Region in which the above S3 bucket exists

AWS_S3_ACL.description: S3 canned ACL for document attachments

FILE_STORAGE_UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE.description: Maximum file upload size in bytes

SENTRY_DSN.description: An API key for Sentry if you wish to collect error reporting (optional)

SENTRY_TUNNEL.description: A sentry tunnel URL for bypassing ad blockers in the UI (optional)

DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.description: The default interface language. See translate.getoutline.com for a list of available language codes and their rough percentage translated.
